text: nimaginta munceyu navu kalisidda deva dutaru hagu pravadigalu enadaru apeksisidagalella sainananu avara apeksegala jote sansayavannu serisiddide. Adare saitananu serisiddannu allahanu alisihakuttane mattu a balika allahanu, (avara manas'sugalalli) tanna vacanagalannu sthiragolisuttane. Allahanu ballavanu mattu yuktivantanagiddane
